cluster_information.name: RVC Run Mode
cluster_information.description: This cluster is derived from the Mode Base cluster to define specifics for Robotic Vacuum Cleaner devices. It also defines a namespace for the running modes of these devices. Commands and attributes for controlling the running mode of an RVC device.

fields.name: Label
fields.description: A human-readable string for the mode option

enum_values.name: Stuck
enum_values.description: Device is stuck and cannot proceed

enum_values.name: WaterTankLidOpen
enum_values.description: Device water tank lid is open

enum_values.name: MopCleaningPadMissing
enum_values.description: Device mop cleaning pad is missing

enum_values.name: Idle
enum_values.description: The device is not performing any of the main operations of the other modes. However, auxiliary actions, such as seeking the charger or charging, may occur

enum_values.name: Cleaning
enum_values.description: The device was asked to clean so it may be actively running, or paused due to an error, due to a pause command, or for recharging etc. If currently paused and the device can resume it will continue to clean

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the mode change request

parameters.name: StatusText
parameters.description: Optional descriptive text for the status

attributes.name: SupportedModes
attributes.description: List of supported modes that the device can be set to

attributes.name: CurrentMode
attributes.description: The current mode of the device

attributes.name: StartUpMode
attributes.description: The mode that the device should start in when powered on

attributes.name: OnMode
attributes.description: The mode that the device should be set to when the On/Off cluster's OnOff attribute becomes TRUE
